#include <map>
#include <set>
#include <list>
#include <cmath>
#include <ctime>
#include <deque>
#include <queue>
#include <stack>
#include <bitset>
#include <cstdio>
#include <vector>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <numeric>
#include <sstream>
#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        long long int n,p,odd=0,even=0,ans;
        cin>>n;
        while(n--)
        {
            cin>>p;
            if(p&1)
                odd++;
            else
                even++;
        }
        ans = even*odd + (even*(even-1))/2;
        cout<<ans<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
